summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 38638, creating Local Improvement District No. 3164, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 60th Avenue Southwest, from Beach Drive to West Spokane Street; 61st Avenue Southwest, from Beach Drive to West Hanford Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5875 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district, payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved July 31, 1918 and published August 3, 1918.
